io.tarantool.driver

Class StandaloneTarantoolClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.tarantool.driver.AbstractTarantoolClient
      • io.tarantool.driver.StandaloneTarantoolClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TarantoolClient, AutoCloseable

    public class StandaloneTarantoolClient
extends AbstractTarantoolClient
    Main class for connecting to a single Tarantool server. Provides basic API for interacting with the database and manages connections.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StandaloneTarantoolClient

        public StandaloneTarantoolClient()
        Create a client. Default guest credentials will be used. Connects to a Tarantool server on localhost using the default port (3301)

      • StandaloneTarantoolClient

        public StandaloneTarantoolClient(TarantoolCredentials credentials)
        Create a client using provided credentials information. Connects to a Tarantool server on localhost using the default port (3301)
        Parameters:
        credentials - Tarantool user credentials holder
        See Also:
        TarantoolCredentials

      • StandaloneTarantoolClient

        public StandaloneTarantoolClient(TarantoolCredentials credentials,
                                 String host,
                                 int port)
        Create a client using provided credentials information. Connects to a Tarantool server using the specified host and port.
        Parameters:
        credentials - Tarantool user credentials holder
        host - valid host name or IP address
        port - valid port number
        See Also:
        TarantoolCredentials

      • StandaloneTarantoolClient

        public StandaloneTarantoolClient(TarantoolCredentials credentials,
                                 TarantoolServerAddress address)
        Create a client using provided credentials information. Connects to a Tarantool server using the specified server address.
        Parameters:
        credentials - Tarantool user credentials holder
        address - Tarantool server address
        See Also:
        TarantoolCredentials, TarantoolServerAddress

      • StandaloneTarantoolClient

        public StandaloneTarantoolClient(TarantoolClientConfig config,
                                 TarantoolServerAddress address)
        Create a client. Connects to a Tarantool server using the specified server address. The default connection selection strategy is used.
        Parameters:
        config - client configuration
        address - Tarantool server address
        See Also:
        TarantoolCredentials, TarantoolConnectionSelectionStrategies.RoundRobinStrategyFactory, TarantoolServerAddress

      • StandaloneTarantoolClient

        public StandaloneTarantoolClient(TarantoolClientConfig config,
                                 TarantoolSingleAddressProvider addressProvider,
                                 ConnectionSelectionStrategyFactory selectStrategyFactory)
        Create a client. The server address for connecting to the server is specified by the passed address provider.
        Parameters:
        config - client configuration
        addressProvider - provides Tarantool server address for connection
        selectStrategyFactory - instantiates strategies which provide the algorithm of selecting connections from the connection pool for performing the next request
        See Also:
        TarantoolClientConfig

      • connectionManager

        protected TarantoolConnectionManager connectionManager(TarantoolClientConfig config,
                                                       TarantoolConnectionFactory connectionFactory,
                                                       TarantoolConnectionListeners listeners)
        Description copied from class: AbstractTarantoolClient
        Provides a connection manager for Tarantool server connections
        Specified by:
        connectionManager in class AbstractTarantoolClient
        Parameters:
        config - contains Tarantool client configuration options
        connectionFactory - provides helper methods for connection instantiation
        listeners - listeners which will be invoked once all connections are established
        Returns:
        connection manager
